column4: After i installed the maverick i cant boot the windows xp and it returns to the grub list again and again ??
hii, After i installed the maverick i cant boot the windows xp and it returns to the grub list again and again ??
It sounds like you accidentally installed grub to your windows partition.
Can you run boot info script as explained here http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1291280 and pastebin the RESULTS.txt to be sure?
one min and i will send it, where should i paste ?
That confirms it. Follow this guide to restore the windows PBR: http://sourceforge.net/apps/mediawiki/bootinfoscript/index.php?title=Boot_Problems:Boot_Sector
will i need to reinstall the ubuntu?
thanks i will get back to you.
can i change the sequence of booting after that?
According to your grub.cfg windows should already be the first option.
